other_tests.findings: Avid F-18 FDG uptake in the pulmonary lesions (max SUV 26.85) and a large abdominal mass (5 /H110036 cm, SUV 24.91) with multiple smaller mesenteric nodules showing significant metabolic activity.
other_tests.changes_over_time: All lesions showed regression on follow-up PET/CT scan performed 2 months after presentation; only the large abdominal lesion took up F-18 FDG, yet in a much lower intensity (SUV 3.57).

other_tests.findings: Pathology showed inflammation and no malignant cells.
Confirmed the presence of a tumor in the left main bronchus; cytologic examination showed no malignancy.
